name: The Godfather: The Game
description:
The Godfather puts you into the action of the legendary films. After a life of small-time jobs and petty thefts, you are accepted into the Corleone family.

GAME FEATURES

Control New York
Join the Corleone Family in the battle to rule the city and exert power over the other NY families: Stracci, Tattaglia, Cuneo, and Barzini. How you go about gaining power—through negotiation, intimidation, or a strategic mix …

Do It Your Way

The non-linear action adventure gameplay features original missions as well as missions directly from the film. Whether you tackle the main missions, take on side jobs, or explore the open environment, there’s an experience f…
Enter the World of The Godfather
Create your own mobster and climb your way to power in the Corleone Family. Along the way you will interact with characters and intersect scenes from the classic movie.

Pressure Point Targeting

A dead man can’t talk. Pressure point targeting lets you get a less-than-lethal lock on parts of an opponent’s body so he’s still around to give you the information you need.
Respect and Consequences
Use your powers of loyalty and fear to earn respect throughout New York City.Respect could be one of the most important weapons in your war for the underworld.

Wield the Power of the BlackHand

The power of intimidation is in your hands. Use the BlackHand Control combat system to execute punches, kicks, grabs, and even strangleholds.
